name: Dice-Alien
description:
Another game-jam game i've made.This one was for the gmtk2022 jam.

Unfortunately i had to remove it from the listing , as i had to update it after the time limit. The game was fully done a few hours before the deadline,but i had to leave on the day of the deadline and didnt check if the final build worked.Turns out the only feedback i'd get is that my game doesnt work.

Basically the menu canvas was set in the wrong mode and wasn't visible/reachable, because of that i had to remove it from the game jam.

It was still alot of fun to make and i think the game is pretty cool and fun to play.If you like grapples in games, this might be a game you like.
